H0.text: From which country do French fries originate? France, Belgium or Switzerland. France

H1.text: From which country do French fries originate? France, Belgium or Switzerland. Belgium

H2.text: From which country do French fries originate? France, Belgium or Switzerland. Switzerland

H3.text: From which country do French fries originate? France, Belgium or Switzerland. Suiza

A4.text: Pierre Leclercq asserts that fries are of French origin.

A5.text: Jo Gérard never produced the manuscript that supports his claim that potatoes were deep‑fried prior to 1680 in the Meuse valley.
